name: Nunu & Willump
title: the Boy and His Yeti
lore: Once upon a time, there was a boy who wanted to prove he was a hero by slaying a fearsome monster—only to discover that the beast, a lonely and magical yeti, merely needed a friend. Bound together by ancient power and a shared love of snowballs, Nunu and Willump now ramble wildly across the Freljord, breathing life into imagined adventures. They hope that somewhere out there, they will find Nunu's mother. If they can save her, maybe they will be heroes after all…
blurb: Once upon a time, there was a boy who wanted to prove he was a hero by slaying a fearsome monster—only to discover that the beast, a lonely and magical yeti, merely needed a friend. Bound together by ancient power and a shared love of snowballs, Nunu...
allytips: Consume allows Nunu to stay in a lane against ranged opponents.
You can choose to interrupt Absolute Zero early for partial damage if an opponent is about to run out of range.
It's often beneficial to delay the casting of Absolute Zero until the initial round of disables are used. Try to hang back before rushing into a team fight.
enemytips: Interrupting the charge up on Absolute Zero will lower the amount of damage your team takes.
Using Summoner Flash is a surefire way to escape Absolute Zero.
Biggest Snowball Ever moves very fast but cannot turn as quickly, so don't try to escape it by running away in a straight line.  Instead, make sudden, sharp turns.

riot_spell_q.name: Consume
riot_spell_q.description: Willump takes a bite out of a minion, monster, or enemy champion, dealing damage and healing himself.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Willump takes a bite of an enemy, dealing damage and healing himself. This healing increases by {{ lowhealthhealingscalar*100 }}% when he is below {{ lowhealththreshhold*100 }}% health.

Monsters and minions: Deals {{ monsterminiondamage }} true damage and heals for {{ monsterhealing }}.

Champions: Deals {{ totalchampiondamage }} magic damage and heals for {{ championhealing }}.

riot_spell_w.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
riot_spell_w.description: Willump creates a snowball that grows in size and speed as he rolls it.  The snowball damages and knocks up enemies.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Willump rolls a snowball that grows in size and speed. When it collides with an enemy champion, large monster, or wall, it explodes, dealing up to {{ maximumsnowballdamage }} magic damage to nearby enemies and knocking them up for up to {{ maximumstunduration }}s.

Reactivating the ability releases the snowball and rolls it forward on a straight path.

Holding a turn causes Willump to turn faster in that direction.

riot_spell_e.name: Snowball Barrage
riot_spell_e.description: Nunu throws multiple snowballs that damage enemies.  When he's finished, Willump roots any champions or large monsters that were hit by a snowball.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Nunu throws 3 snowballs. Snowball Barrage can be cast two additional times to throw even more snowballs. Enemies hit take {{ totalsnowballdamage }} magic damage per snowball. Enemies hit by 3 consecutive snowballs are slowed by {{ slowamount*-100 }}% for {{ slowduration }}s. Champions and large monsters become Snowbound.

Willump's Turn: After {{ totalspellduration }} seconds, all enemies within range that are Snowbound take {{ totalrootdamage }} magic damage and become rooted for {{ rootduration }}s.

riot_spell_r.name: Absolute Zero
riot_spell_r.description: Nunu & Willump create a powerful blizzard in an area that slows enemies and deals massive damage at the end.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Willump channels for {{ channelduration }} seconds, creating a powerful blizzard. Enemies in the blizzard are slowed by {{ slowstartamount*-100 }}%, increasing to {{ maxslowamount*-100 }}% over the duration. Nunu & Willump receive a shield that absorbs {{ totalshieldamount }} damage that decays over {{ shielddecayduration }} seconds after the blizzard ends.

When the blizzard ends, enemies in the area take up to {{ maximumdamage }} magic damage, based on the blizzard's duration.

riot_spell_i.name: Call of the Freljord
riot_spell_i.description: Nunu increases the attack speed and movement speed of Willump and a nearby ally.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Call of the Freljord
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nunu's''' and '''Willump's''' next instance of damage dealt to an enemy {{tip|champion}}, large {{tip|monster}} or {{tip|turrets|structure}} grants both '''Willump''' and the nearest allied champion ''Call of the Freljord'' for 4 seconds, prioritizing the ally with {{sti|{{as|'''highest''' attack speed}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: {{sbc|Call of the Freljord:}} Targets gain {{sti|{{as|20% '''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and {{sti|ms|{{as|10% '''bonus''' movement speed}}}}. Additionally, '''Willump''' gains {{tip|splash damage}} on his [[basic attack]]s, dealing {{as|30% AD}} {{as|physical damage}} in a cone to enemies behind the target.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: '''Nunu''' and '''Willump''' cannot trigger ''Call of the Freljord'' from the same enemy again for a time. Successive triggers of ''Call of the Freljord'' will stack the duration.
wikia_skill_i1.notes: * The splash damage will critically strike when the basic attack does, but will not deal any bonus damage.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Consume
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' takes a bite of a target enemy after {{fd|0.25}} seconds, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} and {{tip|healing}} himself. The heal is increased by 50% when below {{as|{{sti|health|50% of '''maximum''' health}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling:
{{st|Champion Damage|{{ap|60 to 220}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}} {{as|(+ 5% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8 to 215*0.8}} {{as|(+ 56% AP)}} {{as|(+ 8% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Champions|{{ap|75*0.8*1.5 to 215*0.8*1.5}} {{as|(+ 84% AP)}} {{as|(+ 12% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: Against {{tip|minions}} and {{tip|monsters}} he deals {{tip|true damage|{{as|true damage}}}} instead, and restores 25% more health.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling2:
{{st|Non-Champion Damage|{{ap|340 to 980}}}}
{{st|Base Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75 to 215}} {{as|(+ 70% AP)}} {{as|(+ 10% '''bonus''' health)}}|Empowered Healing from Non-Champions|{{ap|75*1.5 to 215*1.5}} {{as|(+ 105% AP)}} {{as|(+ 15% '''bonus''' health)}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* Icon border glows when he is within the maximum healing threshold.
* If the ability would deal lethal damage and the target is a minion or small-medium monster, it will instead perform an unique animation, {{tip|stun|stunning}} and {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them, and then deal the {{as|true damage}}.
* {{tip|Spell shield|Spell shields}} will block the damage and the heal.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Biggest Snowball Ever!
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Willump''' breaks free of active {{tip|slow|slowing}} effects and conjures a {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} that he {{ct|channel|begins rolling|attack=false|move=true|cast=Recasting the ability will interrupt it. All the other abilities are disabled|items=false|consume=false|spells=false}} in the target direction for up to 10 seconds, increasing in power over 5 seconds. Its size radius also increases to {{pp|3|changedisplay=true|type=charge time|75 to 200|0 to 5|formula= Increases by 62.5 units every 2.5 seconds}} units. He can steer with a {{tt|slow turn rate|See notes.}} that increases over time; changing direction resets the turn rate.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: The duo is slowed by 50% for the first 1 second, but is {{cci|Slow immune icon.png|border=false|Slow resist#Slow Immunity|immune}} to other {{tip|slow|slows}} and keeps all movement speed buffs at time of cast for the duration of the charge. After {{tt|a delay|See notes.}}, the duo gains {{sti|ms|{{tt|{{as|14 movement speed}}|Estimated}}}} every {{fd|0.25}} seconds, up to the greater value between {{ft|Total MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}|Total [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|Uncapped]] Flat MS + {{pp|85 to 255}}}} (''click to toggle''). The bonus movement speed from ''Biggest Snowball Ever!'' ignores the [[Movement_speed#Movement_speed_caps|movement speed cap]].
wikia_skill_w1.description3: The snowball rolls over minions and small monsters in its path dealing {{as|magic damage}}, with the base damage increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}} and the ratio increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 100*2/3|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}}.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling3: {{st|Minimum Rollover Damage|{{ap|12 to 24}} {{as|(+ 60% AP)}}|Maximum Rollover Damage|{{ap|12*5 to 24*5}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description4: The snowball explodes upon colliding with an enemy {{tip|champion}}, [[Champion summoned units#Minion|large champion summoned unit]], medium-large [[monster]] or terrain, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to surrounding enemies, increased by {{pp|6|type=charge time|key=%|0;0 to 400|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}}, {{tip|airborne|knocking them up}} for {{pp|6|type=charge time|0.5;0.5 to 0.75|0 to 5|displayformula=Increases per game tick after 1 second.}} seconds and subsequently {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for {{pp|12|type=charge time|0;0;0;0 to 0.5|0;1;2 to 5|displayformula=Increases per game tick after 2.33 seconds.}} seconds.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling4: {{st|Minimum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36 to 72}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Explosion Damage|{{ap|36*5 to 72*5}} {{as|(+ 150% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_w1.description5: After 10 seconds, upon re-activation after {{fd|0.5}} seconds, or if the duo is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, they will let loose the snowball, sending it rolling forward for an additional {{pp|6|type=charge time|750;750 to 1750|0 to 5|displayformula=increases per frame after 1 second}} units during which it will not grow any larger and will explode upon colliding with an enemy unit.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* There are 3 stages where the turn rate increases from the original one:
** After turning for 1 second, the turn rate is increased to 175%.
** After turning for 3 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 250%.
** After turning for 6 seconds, the turn rate is increased to 325% where it caps.
* The time threshold to begin gaining bonus movement speed may be bugged, as Flat Bonus MS increases the time while % Bonus MS decreases the time.
** The formula appears to be (X / 100) - Y, where:
*** X = Total Flat MS after caps
*** Y = 0.1 per 1% %MS
* The delay is not modified from its initially calculated value on-cast, even if additional movement speed is gained.
* '''Nunu and Willump's''' movement speed always increases in increments of ~14, regardless of which total value he will reach. This takes 6 increments to reach the Total MS + 85, but may take more to reach the Uncapped Flat + 85. Due to flat bonuses increasing the time threshold, it is possible for the ability's effects to end before reaching the total uncapped movement speed.
* If '''Nunu''' turns continuously he will create a {{tt|600|Estimated}} unit circle, increased with '''bonus''' movement speed, striking the same point up to 3 times, for a maximum of {{ap|180|225|270|315|360}} {{as|(+ 300% AP)}} magic damage. The damage can be further increased by detonating the snowball, for a total of {{ap|360|450|540|630|720}} {{as|(+450% AP)}} magic damage.
* {{cai|Realm Warp|Ryze}} will only teleport '''Nunu and Willump''', leaving the {{ccib|Biggest Snowball Ever! Minimap.png||snowball}} behind.
* Hovering the cursor on the HUD (e.g minimap / champion portraits) does not affect the cast and steering of ''Biggest Snowball Ever!''.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Snowball Barrage
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu''' throws a volley of 3 snowballs in the target direction over {{fd|0.4}} seconds, each snowball shattering upon hitting an enemy, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to enemies in a cone.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling: {{st|Damage Per Snowball|{{ap|16 to 48}} {{as|(+ 6% AP)}}|Damage Per Volley|{{ap|16*3 to 48*3}} {{as|(+ 18% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|16*3*3 to 48*3*3}} {{as|(+ 54% AP)}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.description2: Enemies hit 3 times are {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 50% for 1 second. Champions and large monsters hit once are also ''Snowbound'' for 4 seconds, resetting on each hit.
wikia_skill_e1.description3: ''Snowball Barrage'' can be re-activated up to 2 times at no cost for 3 seconds. An enemy cannot be {{tip|slow|slowed}} more than once. After 3 seconds, it is ''Willump's Turn''.
wikia_skill_e1.description4: {{sbc|Willump's Turn:}} ''Snowbound'' enemies around '''Willump''' take {{as|magic damage}} and are {{tip|root|rooted}} for {{pp|0.5 to 1.5}} seconds.
wikia_skill_e1.notes:
* Because of snowballs' cast time and travel time it is possible for ''Willump's Turn'' to come in while '''Nunu''' is still launching his snowballs.
* '''Nunu''' can move while casting ''Snowball Barrage''.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Absolute Zero
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nunu and Willump''' {{ct|channel|sap|cast=interrupts|items=interrupts,true,,false|spells=true,interrupts,interrupts,interrupts,false}} heat from the surrounding area, {{tip|slow|slowing}} affected enemies by {{pp|13|type=channel time|key=%|0;50 to 95;95|0 to 3|displayformula=increases by 4.5% every 0.25 seconds. ''Starts at 0.25 seconds and finishes at 2.75 seconds''}}, as well as gaining a {{tip|shield}}. The affected area is hidden if the duo is not {{tip|sight|visible}} to the enemy team.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: After 3 seconds or if the duo is {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}}, surrounding enemies take {{as|magic damage}}, reduced by {{pp|4|key=%|type=channel time|changedisplay=true|100 to 0|0 to 3}}. Once the channel ends, affected enemies will remain {{tip|slow|slowed}} for {{pp|13|type=channel time|0 to 3|0 to 3}} seconds and any remaining shield will decay over 3 seconds.
wikia_skill_r1.description3: The duo can interrupt the ability after {{fd|0.5}} seconds by inputting a movement command or casting one of their other abilities.
